workshoptitle: Prepare a Tenancy for EBS Migration Following CIS Benchmark Security Guidelines

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second for LiveLabs. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Get Started
tutorials.description: Establish Oracle Clound account credentials, download the key-data.txt file, and log in to your Oracle Cloud account.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Set Up the Landing Zone
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

Optional: Manage the EBS Cloud Manager Virtual Machine
